title: Quick-Fix
desc:
That was a vague refrence to TF2, cause this is based on a source game and TF2 is a source game- anyway, fixed the Latest Update System. 
Instead of refrencing the Roblox Update System, which you cant unless you are the creator, it now uses the Roblox's Mod Github Repository. 
This means it might not be updated for every update, I cant trust myself to do that, but at least it works.
